message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONS_EXCEED_LIMIT
message.locale: The number of %1s deductions on this case have exceeded the limit of %2n maximum deductions.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_TYPE_CREATION_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: Creation of Deduction Type %1s on this case is not allowed by the user

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_CONCERN_ROLE_MISSING
message.locale: The third party concern role must be filled out for third party deductions.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_CONCERN_ROLE_INVALID
message.locale: The third party concern role ID does not exist.

message.name: ERR_LIABILITY_SET_FOR_ANOTHER_DEDUCTION
message.locale: The selected external liability is already applied to the %1c deduction.
